languages.text: "В таком случае Регина Зауэрбэк будет подвергнута допросу с пристрастием и после казнена".
"In that case, Regina Sauerback shall be subjected to intense interrogation followed by execution."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае Регина Зауэрбэк будет подвергнута допросу с пристрастием и после казнена".

traits.locale_text: "In this case, Regina Sauerback is sentenced to an intense interrogation and then executed afterwards."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「この場合、レジーナ・ザウアーバックは厳しい尋問の後に死刑を宣告されるだろう」
languages.original_text: "In that case, Regina Sauerback shall be subjected to intense interrogation followed by execution."

traits.locale_text: 「この場合、レジーナ・ザウアーバックは厳しい尋問の後に死刑を宣告されるだろう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此，将蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克押下去严刑拷打，再处以极刑。”
languages.original_text: "In that case, Regina Sauerback shall be subjected to intense interrogation followed by execution."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，将蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克押下去严刑拷打，再处以极刑。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, Régina Sauerback sera exécutée après avoir subi un interrogatoire intensif. »
languages.original_text: "In that case, Regina Sauerback shall be subjected to intense interrogation followed by execution."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, Régina Sauerback sera exécutée après avoir subi un interrogatoire intensif. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «En ese caso, Regina Sauerback será duramente interrogada y seguidamente será ejecutada».
languages.original_text: "In that case, Regina Sauerback shall be subjected to intense interrogation followed by execution."

traits.locale_text: «Regina Sauerback será duramente interrogada y seguidamente será ejecutada».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Dann wird Regina Sauerback eingehend verhört und anschließend hingerichtet."
languages.original_text: "In that case, Regina Sauerback shall be subjected to intense interrogation followed by execution."

traits.locale_text: "In diesem Fall wird Regina Sauerback zu einem intensiven Verhör und der anschließenden Hinrichtung verurteilt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "O hâlde Regina Sauerback, etraflı bir sorgudan sonra idam edilecektir."
languages.original_text: "In that case, Regina Sauerback shall be subjected to intense interrogation followed by execution."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde Regina Sauerback, etraflı bir sorgudan sonra idam edilecektir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
